effect.name: Lens Distortion with Rotation
effect.description: This shader applies lens distortion to the background based on the object's texture and allows for the rotation of the distortion texture.
effect.author: Based on work from Sphax - Flavien Clermont, Looki, Edit by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Distortion Coefficient
parameter.description: Coefficient controlling the amount of distortion applied to the background.

parameter.name: Base Distortion
parameter.description: Base distortion value that affects the background zoom.

parameter.name: Angle
parameter.description: Angle of rotation for the object's texture

parameter.name: X Center
parameter.description: X center of rotation (relative to the object texture)

parameter.name: Y Center
parameter.description: Y center of rotation (relative to the object texture)
